title: Self-Care the Ayurvedic Way
description: Explore at-home treatments with an Ayurvedic philosophy.
cleaned_text: Casperson and Lauren Gernady explain how to do four basic practices that Ayurveda recommends as part of the essential foundation for health and wellness.
